pages.page: ROCKA will always provide the best cost effective solution to our customer’s challenges for them to be more competitive in the market. LATINAMERICAN PRESENCE A Mexican company with more than 25 years of combined experience, with presence in Latin America offering warehousing, new technologies, shipping solutions and technical expertise to electronic and mechanical industries. Global business experience More than 25 years of combined experience Full understanding of Latin American market Active members of SMTA Local Storage in USA, Mexico, Brazil & Argentina Local technical support OUR PRINCIPALS

We call it High Presicion Cleaning SMT CLEANER PALLET CLEANER CONFORMAL COATING CLEANER BY Biodegradable Rinsing Optional Non-Flammable Low Foaming Rust Inhibiting Ultra Low-Odor Aluminum Compatible Ready to USE Non corrosive VOC free NPE/APE Free Phosphate free Glycol Free Corrosion Inhibition Proven Cleaning Ability Safe on Metals, Composites Long Bath Life Easy Water Rinsing No Additives Required Low Foaming Removes SMT Adhesive Fast Dry Times Replaces Acetone, IPA, MEK, MPK Powerful Cleaning Ability USDA Certified Biobased Low Surface Residue With a process driven, solutions-oriented focus, Vantage is a leading global supplier of process cleaning solutions, coating removers and other surface treatments for aerospace, electronics circuit assembly and other high-reliability industrial markets.
